title: Have 3D Printed Rhino Horns Been Developed to Stop Poaching?
subtitle: Several biotechnology firms have developed undetectably fake rhino horns as an anti-poaching measure, but wildlife experts aren't thrilled about the innovation.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A biotech company has developed a 3D synthetic rhino horn that will eventually undercut the market for poached horns.
